page.title: 13TOURISM IN COVERDALE.
page.content: Coverdale has become a popular tourist area,in the Yorkshire Dales. The writer James Herriot having included the area in his many books. {Places offering accommodation _ Coverdale Country Hotel opened 1985 Well House Bed&Breakfast/evening meal. 3 Holiday Cottages _ Bridge End, Gammersgill. Hindlethwaite Hall, Horsehouse. Soursett Cottage, Arkleside. All cottages are let 26weeks per.year during last week in Aug. visiters from Berkshire,Hampshire,WestSussex,Hamburg in Germany & Warrington. {Places offering refreshment _} Thwaite Arms _Horsehouse,Bar Meals & Theakstons Real Ale brewed in Masham. General Store _Horsehouse,ice cream, hot & cold drinks,homemade sandwiches. {Places to see _}apart from the senery ONE Craft Shop selling local crafts.
